As the Un-Named said, there is a fix for it, I’m just to lazy to post it.

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @The_Un-Named The Un-Named
item.description:
@The_Un-Named wrote:

There’s a fix for it, you need to check if the key needs to see if enter is pressed before using it, then hold enter before typing the key. I’ll post an example later.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @yakman yakman
item.description:
@yakman wrote:

i dont know how SendKeysSilent works, but try changing it to TypeSend(‘the message’); from SRL, if that doesnt work then do SendKeys

item.title: Help please!

item.description:
@acoole wrote:

no… When you type like wave:HI in runescape it comes out as wave;hi

Read full topic

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

It seems to work for me.

program AutoTalker;
{.Include SRL/SRl.Scar}
const

//---------SETUP-----------
Mesage= 'wave:';//Type what you want to say here.
      
//END SETUP//

procedure Actalk;
begin
  SendKeysSilent(Mesage+chr(13))
  wait(1300+Random(3000))
end;

begin
  repeat
    ActivateClient;
    Actalk;
  until(false)
end.

I checked in notepad.

Read full topic

item.title: Help please!
item.dc:creator: @acoole acoole
item.description:
@acoole wrote:

In my auto talker:

[code]//Author: Acoole
//Name: Acoole’s Auto-Talker 1.2
//Date:21 January 2007
//Comments:This is my first script Update.Reccomended for World 1 or 2 or a busy world.

//Description:
// This is a basic Auto talker no form, yet…, I Will update it very frequently
//It uses SRL
//
//------------------------------------------------------------------------
//Release history:
//1.0 Beta- First Public Release. Basic text shouter.
//1.1 Public full, New effect area. Speed of text typing made better.
//----------------------------------------------------------------------
//Current release:
//1.2: Added Activate Client. Now uses SRL(i think). Anti-Randoms YEY!,Time of text improved.
//-----------------------------------------------------------------------
//Future Releases:
//1.4:Logging in for you automaticly,Anti-Ban improvements. General improvements.
//v ??: Full use of the new Scar 3 Fuctions(when it comes out)
//SORRY, if you get the message:
//Line 170: [Hint] (193:43): Variable ‘NEWLINE’ never used in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\Globals.scar
//This is just a weird bug. I Think the script still works.
//----------------------------------------
program AutoTalker;
{.Include SRL/SRl.Scar}
const

//---------SETUP-----------
Mesage= ‘’;//Type what you want to say here.

//END SETUP//

Procedure Actalk;
begin

SendKeysSilent(Mesage+chr(13))
wait(1300+Random(3000))

end;
Begin
Repeat
ActivateClient;
Actalk;
Until(false)
end.[/code]

When you do wave:hi or white:hi

It comes out in RS2 like white;hi

Any way to fix this?

Please help.

Read full topic
